What brings you in today?**PATIENT CHARACTER:** Patient with Mitral atresia

You are experiencing the following symptoms:
- Shortness of breath, especially when lying down or exerting yourself
- Swelling of your ankles and feet
- Fatigue that has been worsening over the past few months
- Heart palpitations and irregular heartbeat sensations
THESE SYMPTOMS CAME INTO FRUITION:
They started gradually over the last three months, initially just feeling more tired than usual after activities, but recently, I’ve noticed my ankles swelling more in the evenings and I get winded even walking short distances. Sometimes, I feel my heart racing or skipping beats, which worries me. I’ve also been feeling more exhausted overall, even when I haven’t done much. I think these symptoms are getting worse, and I’m concerned about what might be going on.
